name: @chatoneswap/dex-wrapper
description: DEX Wrapper - A flexible wrapper for PancakeSwap V3 on BSC

scripts.deploy:mainnet:verify: hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network bsc && hardhat verify --network bsc
scripts.export-abi: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const r=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('artifacts/contracts/core/DexWrapperRouter.sol/DexWrapperRouter.json'));fs.writeFileSync('abis/DexWrapperRouter.json',JSON.stringify(r.abi));" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const r=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('artifacts/contracts/core/FeeManager.sol/FeeManager.json'));fs.writeFileSync('abis/FeeManager.json',JSON.stringify(r.abi));" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const r=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('artifacts/contracts/adapters/PancakeSwapV3Adapter.sol/PancakeSwapV3Adapter.json'));fs.writeFileSync('abis/PancakeSwapV3Adapter.json',JSON.stringify(r.abi));" && echo '✅ ABI 已导出到 abis/ 目录（前端可用）'

author: ChatOneSwap Team
